title: Import Events
tagline: Import events from files, URLs, emails, or paste content directly
pasteHint: Pro tip: You can also paste images or files directly (Ctrl+V / Cmd+V)

urlInput.label: Import from URLs
urlInput.placeholder:
Paste URLs (one per line)
https://example.com/events
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/...
urlInput.hint: Supports web pages, Google Docs/Sheets, and direct file links (max 10 URLs)

states.successMessage: {{count}} events have been imported as drafts

preview.title: Import Preview
preview.confirmMessage: Events will be created as drafts. You can review and publish them later.

emailInbox.title: Import via Email
emailInbox.description: Forward event emails to your personal import address. Events will be extracted automatically from the email body, attachments, and links.
emailInbox.activeDescription: Forward or send event details to this address. Events will be automatically extracted and saved as drafts.
emailInbox.hint: Forward newsletters, invitations, or any email with event details. Supports attachments (PDF, images) and links.
